about_me: Hi, I'm Corina, a passionate Illustrator with over five years of experience bringing stories to life through vibrant visuals. My journey began in traditional art, but I soon discovered a love for digital Illustration and character design. I'm inspired by nature, fashion, and everyday moments, which I often translate into whimsical compositions. Over the years, I've worked with both startups and established brands to create impactful Illustrations for campaigns, packaging, and editorial pieces. My creative process is deeply collaborative. I believe every client's story is unique and deserves a tailored visual language. I'm always excited to explore bold colors and playful styles, while maintaining clear communication throughout every project. I'm committed to delivering work that's not only beautiful but meaningful and strategic. Let's make something magical together!

about_me: I'm Adrian, a dedicated Illustrator who transforms ideas into powerful visuals. My career started with a love for design and evolved into a passion for crafting experiences. I specialize in unique and compelling creations tailored to client goals. Collaboration and clear communication are core to my process. I find inspiration in everyday moments and global trends. Every project is an opportunity to learn, grow, and innovate. I focus on both beauty and functionality in my designs. I'm excited to help brands visually express their stories in new ways. Working with both startups and established names has shaped my versatility. Let's build something memorable together!
